description: red ground with geometric pattern in gold, green, blue and black, 6" wide, along edges; center section: row of llama-like creatures at top, elephants at bottom; row of temple-like structures below llamas with drum-shapes structures below temples, alternating with tree-like motifs; row of mountain shapes below elephants; not a closed tube
dimension: 38 7/8 x 78 1/8 in. (98.74 x 198.44 cm) (folded in half)
title: Buddhist ceremonial wall hanging (Pidan)
